title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 14 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 14 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Cuba’s communist dictator shuts down the Internet to prevent information and has arrested, beaten and killed his countrymen. Twitter does nothing to his account. Yet they banned Donald Trump. The left continues to use racism as political weapon to divide. Rush’s Timeless Wisdom, the democrats 2016 election Russian Hoax has done more to damage the faith in our election system than anything Putin could have dreamed. Clay and Buck agree that any American liberal could not live in any communist country. Liberal caller from Hoboken disagrees with Clay and Buck on Cuba. Fauci calls for children over 3 to wear masks.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
